scripts.build: composer install -o --no-dev && pnpm run uglify && pnpm run cleancss && pnpm run makepot && pnpm run archive
scripts.build:dev: composer install -o && pnpm run uglify && pnpm run cleancss && pnpm run makepot
scripts.uglify: for f in $npm_package_config_paths_js; do file=${f%.js}; node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -c -m > $file.min.js; done
scripts.cleancss: for f in $npm_package_config_paths_css; do echo Processing $f; file=${f%.css}; node_modules/.bin/cleancss -o $file.min.css $f; done
scripts.makepot: wpi18n makepot --domain-path languages --pot-file customs-fees-for-woocommerce.pot --type plugin --main-file customs-fees-for-woocommerce.php --exclude node_modules,tests,docs
scripts.build:qit: composer install --no-dev -o && pnpm run makepot && pnpm run archive:qit && pnpm run postarchive
